data.eml:eml: A new Haptoclinus blenny (Teleostei, Labrisomidae) from deep reefs off Curacao, southern Caribbean, with comments on relationships of the genus

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Baldwin, Carole C., Robertson, D. Ross (2013): A new Haptoclinus blenny (Teleostei, Labrisomidae) from deep reefs off Curacao, southern Caribbean, with comments on relationships of the genus. ZooKeys 306: 71-81, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.306.5198, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.306.5198
